name: Stocksmith
description:
Ah, yes my first project at UMass.

Stocksmith was born from my nascent interests in stocks and ML and their intersecting potential. What started as a web platform evolved to take its final form as a library.

Stocksmith provides packages for techincal, fundamental and sentimental analysis using ML and NLP. This was a collaborative effort between ACM ML and Google DSC at UMass.
